option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# yaml name: CI - Build and Test on: push: branches: - main paths: - 'BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA/**' pull_request: branches: - main paths: - 'BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA/**'
defaults: run: working-directory: BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Setup JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '17'
- name: Grant execute permission for Gradle run: chmod +x ./gradlew
- name: Set project version run: sed -i "s/^version = '.*'$/version = '0.0.1.${{ github.run_number }}'/" build.gradle
- name: Build with Gradle run: ./gradlew clean build
- name: Run tests run: ./gradlew test

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# yaml name: CI - Build and Test on: push: branches: - main paths: - 'BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA/**' pull_request: branches: - main paths: - 'BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA/**'
defaults: run: working-directory: BACKEND/BIBLIOTECA
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Setup JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '17'
- name: Grant execute permission for Gradle run: chmod +x ./gradlew
- name: Set project version run: sed -i "s/^version = '.*'$/version = '0.0.1.${{ github.run_number }}'/" build.gradle
- name: Build with Gradle run: ./gradlew clean build
- name: Run tests run: ./gradlew test
